extendedInfo.description: The music player is a special design for your android phone. With efficient audio decoding capabilities, you can simply playback all the music in the phone list, direct access to the SD card folder, rating for the songs, show up the recently played music and so on. Playback your android phone music has never been so easyAutomatically detect the music in your phone, and add to the playlist; Already have your music organized in folders? This music player gives you direct access to your music folder.Show all music albums, simply find and play your favorite album.Add music to your favorites list.Key Features:* Automatically detect the music in your phone;* Support common music formats, such as mp3, mp4 and other formats;* Support SD card music folder access;* Support play music albums;* Rating for musics, and add to the rating list;* Add music to my favorites list;* Show the recent play list;* Single music play / pause, playback progress and previous/next operation;Please enjoy the music player to bring you a unique music play experience.Keywords: SD card music player, folders, music player, music favorites, recently playback, audio playback, simple player, iPhone player, iTunes

reviews.title: No good for nothing
reviews.comment: Cannot find media on its own.  When started on something, bombs right away.  Sony Xperia tipo + Android 4.0.4
reviews.author: Pawel Danielewicz

reviews.title: No lagg, no skipping.
reviews.comment: Only player I could find that didn\'t make it sound like my music was skipping. Interface is a little lackluster, but I don\'t care, my music sounds good. If your device is having trouble playing music, give this player a shot.
reviews.author: Robert Connell

reviews.comment: great, this one is i looking for
reviews.author: A Google User
